meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Eli Barrieau Maryanne Lewell Mary Beth Hammerstrom Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6713.

td.p: Eli Barrieau, a high school history teacher from Hardwick, Massachusetts
Maryanne Lewell, a high school history teacher from Saint John, New Brunswick, Canada
Mary Beth Hammerstrom, a high school social studies teacher from Anchorage, Alaska

tr.td: MUSIC OF TODAY
HYPHENATED TERMS
SEEN FROM SPACE
BOOKS FOR YOUNG PEOPLE
SPEAK UP!
DON'T SAY UM
(Alex: Each correct response will be an element that does not contain the letters "U-M".)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Maryanne] Salman Rushdie\'s book.)
...
(Alex: Mary Beth, come on over here. You are going to be a finalist. You\'re gonna play for $100,000, starting tomorrow, against these two individuals:)
(John: John Pearson, Richardson, Texas.)
(Becky: Becky Giardina, Martinez, Georgia.)
(Alex: The women outnumber the guy. We\'ll see what happens tomorrow.)
MaryanneWhat are the Satanic Verses?
$7,800
EliWhat is the Satanic Verses?
$14,800
Mary BethWhat are the Satanic Verses?
$8,601
the Satanic Verses')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
